name: Dinomist Pteran
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 "Dinomist" card from your Deck to your hand.
pend_desc: If another "Dinomist" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.
monster_desc: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 "Dinomist" card from your Deck to your hand.
